BIO

Hi, I’m Mei. I'm currently a computer science student at Queens College and I will be graduate in May 2019.

I like coding, cooking, cat and I like experiencing new things.

I can be found on GitHub, and LinkedIn. Take a look at my résumé and feel free to contact me.
